project_description: A Flutter project for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde, featuring an onboarding flow with sliding transitions, authentication options, user verification, and a comprehensive home page experience with ride management, chauffeur profiles, and user dashboard functionality.
architecture_overview: The application follows the Stacked architecture with separate folders for app setup, onboarding features, UI components, and utilities. It uses Stacked for state management, routing, and dependency injection. New feature modules for rides, chauffeurs, and profile management have been added, along with a theme service for dark mode support.

files.name: lib/app/app.dart
files.description: Defines the app structure using StackedApp annotation for routes, dependencies, bottom sheets, and dialogs. It includes routes for the onboarding flow and services for navigation and authentication.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome_view.dart
files.description: The welcome page of the onboarding flow, introducing the Gyde service.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/auth_options_view.dart
files.description: Page for selecting authentication options: phone or email.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/phone_input_view.dart
files.description: Page for entering and validating the user's phone number.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/verification_code_view.dart
files.description: Page for entering the verification code sent to the user's phone.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/email_collection_view.dart
files.description: Page for collecting the user's email address.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome_confirmation_view.dart
files.description: Confirmation page welcoming the user to Gyde.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/terms_conditions_view.dart
files.description: Page displaying the terms and conditions of the Gyde service.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/onboarding_viewmodel.dart
files.description: ViewModel managing the state and logic for the onboarding flow.

files.name: lib/features/home/main_rides_view.dart
files.description: Main rides page with segmented navigation for 'Upcoming', 'Past', and 'Canceled' rides.

files.name: lib/features/home/chauffeur_details_view.dart
files.description: Chauffeur details page showing the profile with car information, availability, and a 'Send Message' button.

files.name: lib/features/home/profile_view.dart
files.description: Profile page displaying user information with sections for subscriptions, promos, payment methods, and analytics.

files.name: lib/features/home/home_viewmodel.dart
files.description: ViewModel managing the state and logic for the home page features.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: The entry point of the application. Sets up the app and runs it.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function that runs the app

dependencies.name: stacked
dependencies.purpose: Stacked architecture for state management and routing

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant main
participant WelcomeView
participant AuthOptionsView
participant PhoneInputView
participant VerificationCodeView
participant EmailCollectionView
participant WelcomeConfirmationView
participant TermsConditionsView
participant MainRidesView
participant ChauffeurDetailsView
participant ProfileView

User -> main: Launch app
main -> WelcomeView: Show welcome page
User -> WelcomeView: Click 'Get Started'
WelcomeView -> AuthOptionsView: Navigate to auth options
User -> AuthOptionsView: Select auth method
AuthOptionsView -> PhoneInputView: Navigate to phone input
User -> PhoneInputView: Enter phone number
PhoneInputView -> VerificationCodeView: Navigate to verification code
User -> VerificationCodeView: Enter code
VerificationCodeView -> EmailCollectionView: Navigate to email collection
User -> EmailCollectionView: Enter email
EmailCollectionView -> WelcomeConfirmationView: Navigate to welcome confirmation
User -> WelcomeConfirmationView: Click 'Continue'
WelcomeConfirmationView -> TermsConditionsView: Navigate to terms and conditions
TermsConditionsView -> MainRidesView: Navigate to main rides page
User -> MainRidesView: View rides
MainRidesView -> ChauffeurDetailsView: View chauffeur details
User -> ChauffeurDetailsView: Send message
ChauffeurDetailsView -> ProfileView: Navigate to profile
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the Stacked architecture. ViewModels (e.g., OnboardingViewModel, HomeViewModel) handle the business logic and state for their respective views. The app.locator.dart file sets up dependency injection, while app.router.dart manages navigation between views.
navigation_flow: The application starts with main.dart, which sets up the app and runs the WelcomeView. The onboarding flow progresses through a series of views with sliding transitions, managed by the Stacked Router defined in app.router.dart. The home page experience includes segmented navigation for rides, chauffeur details, and profile management, with a bottom navigation bar for easy access to main sections.
